title: Connecting to maestro
body:
Hi, I do not know where to put this thread, but when I open league of legends I don't get to click launch as I normally would and I get an error on my screen that says: Maestro Error: There was a problem connecting with Maestro. League of legends will now exit. Please restart the client.

How do I fix this? I cannot play as it won't let me login :(

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems establishing a connection to the authentication servers.  As a first step, I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewalls to allow access.  Hopefully, this will get you logged in!
